room_title: 3FL Apt of KINGS + whirlpool in heart of Prague

reviews.text: Great place! Great experience!

This apartment was great! We had plenty of room, everything was clean and comfortable. The owners were welcoming and helped us at check in. The area is perfect. You are so close to the city center and all of the sites. Also, the rooftop is entirely yours. It had beautiful views of the city and the hot tub was awesome to have at the end of a long day of walking!
üëçüèª

We recently stayed at this beautiful Airbnb apartment in Prague with a group of 5 guys and we couldn't have been more impressed. The location was absolutely perfect, right in the heart of the city and close to all the major attractions.

The highlight of the trip was definitely the rooftop Jacuzzi with an amazing view. It was the perfect spot to unwind after a long day of exploring and provided a truly unique experience. The apartment was spacious, comfortable, and well-equipped with all the amenities we needed for our stay.

Overall, we had a fantastic time at this Airbnb and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a luxurious and convenient place to stay in Prague. The host was also very friendly and helpful, making our experience even better. We can't wait to come back!

An incredible apartment with one of the best 360 degree views in Prague. The terrace with jacuzzi tub was our highlight, and the bedding was extremely comfortable.

The hosts were communicative and accommodating.
Incredible stay for a large group. Great location, very clean, and great communication. Thank you!
Spacious apartment in a great location

What a wonderful New Year's Eve from the rooftop terrace of this great rental.  For over 3 hours we had the most beautiful 360 degree view of fireworks in the city of Prague.  Great location for seeing the sites of Prague, visiting the Christmas Markets, shopping and enjoying the delicious restaurants all within walking distance to the apartment.  The rental team were extremely responsive to any questions I had prior to arrival, including arranging transportation back to Munich.  They also have compiled a wonderful Prague guide which was great to share with the rest of my family prior to visiting so we had a plan once we arrived.    Michal&Michael's team were great to work with!!
The apartment is in a fantastic location, very spacious and well equipped. We had a lovely stay and would love to come back again in the summer!

Prague was exceptional and this apartment was a big factor in this experience. The beautiful views from the rooftop gave perspective of the architecture and location of the major places to see - these are easily within walking distance. Ubers are super easy to get to/ from places if pressed for time or don't want to walk 1-2 miles between venues.

We had a group of 8 and the apartment accommodated us well and provided great common space. Toiletries are sparse so do bring your own. The kitchen is well appointed for snacking, drinking and light cooking. The two french presses were VERY handy! The beds are very comfortable and cozy.

We didn't have heat for the first 36+ hours so we were chilly for a bit - probably not a regular occurrence and eventually things got fixed (owners very communicative). The place is a tad run down with rips in the dining chairs, minor spots on sofa, rips in the hot tub cover so if that bugs you then take note. It didn't bug us at all and were minor.

Our group of 6 had a wonderful time in Prague. The location was excellent, walk-able to old town square, Charles st bridge, plenty of restaurants, shopping, and entertainment. The apartment itself was beautiful, plenty of room for us. We really enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back!  Check in was easy, and they were very friendly and helpful and accommodating.
Great home in the perfect location.
amazing stay in a beautiful apartment. prime location with plenty of bars and restaurants around it. the hot tub on the roof is the jewel in its crown, can't recommend highly enough

The flat is very very good!
The same like on pictures, right in the heart of Prague with incredible view and jacuzzi on the rooftop!
100% match
Love it!

Fantastic space in a great location. Roof top is a great surprise. Better than expected. Kitchen is really well equipped too. Appreciated the sleeping options and washer and dryer. Elevator was also a pleasant surprise.
Location is great. The apartment was clean and tidy. Place has an interesting feel to it.

Amazing apartment. Interiors were fabulous. Great location. Accessible to all needs. Perfect view of the city. Comfortable bed. Soft pillows. Everyone had a great time. Reasonable value for a large group. Hosts were kind and communication was easy. Highly recommended.

Such a lovely apartment in the heart of Prague city. We were there for one night only during our Europe trip and wished we could have stayed more at this place. The whirlpool at the top was amazing with stunning Prague city views.  Our host chritina was very helpful and polite and explained us everything in detail.  Very spacious flat and modernly decorated.  Highly recommended.

Location is great. The apartment was not clean upon arrival. There is active water damage in the primary bedroom that resulted in a musty odor and falling debris from the ceiling. Could be a nice place, but it is in need of repairs.
Had a great time at this place. The hosts take care of you well and the place is gorgeous.
Amazing location and beautiful place. There was a bad leak in one of the bathroom ceilings, but the team was very responsive.

Fantastic experience. The property was top-notch, perfect location, and incredible hosts. The communication and attentiveness was superb. I would recommend this airbnb to anyone and we really enjoyed everything about the experience.
Fantastic place - great location in old town, spacious, awesome rooftop view. The nicest Airbnb I have every stayed in.

Great location, right on a tram stop and very close to city center. Very responsive whenever we needed anything. We had a large group so two bathrooms was a challenge but we made it work. The rooftop is amazing! We had some hot tub issues but they were great about getting them resolved. We would definitely book this apartment again.

Great location in the old town of Prague, walking distance from everything you'd want to do.  Apartment is very clean.  Every issue we had was addressed extremely quickly (within minutes).  Check-out was very simple.  Would not hesitate to book again on return trips to Prague!

What a beautiful roof top in the center of Prague !
We haven‚Äôt spent enough time to enjoy the full potential of this apartment. It was raining while we could have used the spa üò≠
We hope to come back.
By the way, Michal, our host, managed perfectly our late arrival. Thanks him !

Everything‚Äôs perfect :) location of the flat is amazing! City and people anyway
The flat is great with rooftop terrace ! We had a great time there

WOW!

Beautiful apartment right in the center of everything.
Hot tub was great to hang out in after walking all over Prague.
The playstation 5 was a definite plus.

For our multi-generational family trip, this was the prefect place.
Very nice place. The only negative point I would say is the presence of a camera on the roof terrace that takes away some privacy.
was great

Great location
Check in was easy
Communication and late check out great
Great stay

We really enjoyed our stay at this apartment! The location was great as it was within walking distance to the old square and many shops and restaurants. It was very hot when we visited Prague, and we really appreciated the air conditioning and fans to keep us cool inside. At night, it was very relaxing to sit in the hot tub overlooking Prague castle after a long day of walking around. Hosts were also very responsive by message when we had questions before and during our stay. We'd definitely stay here again.

The 3FL Apartment of Kings was a beautiful property, iin a perfect location, and  with amazing views from the very spacious rooftop deck. I had questions before and during our stay and they were answered within minutes. If we ever travel back to Prague, we will definitely rent this property again.
Beautiful place in a perfect location. Everything is within walking distance and all public transportations are steps away from the apartment. The apartment itself was also very nice and comfortable.

This is the most amazing property for a large group!!! Super spacious, super clean with such comfortable beds!! The rooftop hot tub is to die for.. nothing can beat that!

It‚Äôs a 6 minute walk from Charles square which is the best location you could ever ask for. The hosts are friendly and responsive. All in all we Loved everything :)

It was wonderful stay and the communication with M&M team made the experience even better.
The location is superb and the roof experience with the Jacuzzi is magnificent.

Had a fantastic stay at Michal&Michaels apartment. Great communication from start to finish and apartment was perfect. The views from the rooftop were excellent üëå Look forward to visiting again in the future. Thanks again,Chris
perfect location! Would book again!
Everything was perfect perfect location and facilities. Hosts were brilliant and super helpful. We will defiantly book again.
Very attentive and pleasant owners. Incredibly welcoming and their property was second to none in regard to location and space. I don‚Äôt think you can do better while in Prague.

Absolutely one of the most amazing places to stay in Prague. Amazing view. But most of all i‚Äôm really impressed about the top quality service we got from the staff and owner of Michal&Michael. The communication began 2 weeks before the arrival and they did everything to make our stay pleasent.
Thank you!
Large and amazing place with many cool architectural finishes and details. Located in the center of everything. Perfect location!  Loved our trip!
We had an amazing weekend at this place. 100% recommend! Great spot for a stag party or to have a sight seeing tour.
Great place!

The apartment is clean, new and perfectly situated. Once you've figured out parking (which was difficult in Prague but there is a nearby garage) you'll enjoy this beautiful apartment with great rooms and a roof deck with hot-tub. It was great for our family gathering and the kids loved the cool layout. It's a short walk to the sights and there are cafes nearby. We had a wonderful stay.
Great great great place!!! Best location, and gorgeous accommodations!
The accomodation was nothing short of amazing, it is in a great location and offered a fantastic base for a large group. Couldn't recommend it more.

The apartment is stunning. The most perfect location, views, layout. Really a one of a kind apartment. The hosts are friendly and helpful, and their communication is great.

A lovely bbq on the rooftop, in the hot tub with a view of the castle. What could be better?

Would highly recommend and we will be returning, for sure!
amazing apartment perfect for stag do or large groups. clean comfortable with all necessary amenities. Also a great host that I could message about the apartment or the gs to do in praque.

The experience at the penthouse was fantastic, extremely well organised for check in and check out. Beautiful penthouse and great customer service. I can‚Äôt wait to stay again‚Ä¶.. if I can even get it! Tried to rebook a month later but it‚Äôs fully booked! Highly recommend dealing with Michael & Michael
The place was really clean and very well priced. The host was really quick to respond to any questions I had during the night and kept checking in to see if everything was going good

Our family of 5 had a wonderful time in this beautiful home. The location was amazing and the view from the rooftop was magical. We had more than enough room and appreciated being greeted and shown around by Thomas when we arrived. Would definitely recommend this home. Thank you for allowing us to stay in your home.

Great apartment, fantastic location and awesome hosts. The apartment is perfectly located. The host are very responsive and very accommodating. The balcony is amazing and you get a great view of all the surrounding areas. 5* and would 100% recommend.

The apartment is GORGEOUS and in such a perfect location for public transportation, exploring on foot and tons of great places to eat and drink.

Everything was exactly as described and photographed. We loved the layout of the place and having some privacy between the bedrooms as we were traveling with our mothers for the first time.

The rooftop was incredible and having a late night soak (mornings too) was so nice to decompress after long days of exploring.

We also had a very late night discovery of locking our key in the apartment and were able to get in very shortly after messaging even though it must have been SO inconvenient for the team.

We would 100% recommend this beautiful place for any group of 3+ you won't regret it!

Thanks so much for making our home away so enjoyable.
Fantastic location downtown (right next to Rudolfinum / Charles bridge), magnificient view from the rooftop terrasse! The apartment is also well equiped.  Can't wait for my next visit :)

Location and terrace of the appartament are incredible.

But if you go in a big group (we were 14) it can be a little bit uncomfortable: there are only two bathrooms and three real bedrooms.

The apartment could not have been in a better location! The rooftop hot tub was perfect to end a long say of walking around Prague. Beds were comfortable and the living room was spacious and well designed.  I would stay here again the next time I visit!

We had a great stay at Michal & Michael. The apartment is just amazing, very well arranged and spacious. Great location too! Everything is close and the neighborhood is very beautiful.
If you want to have a good time with friends in prague, don't hesitate!
It was not clean. Big problem with Heater. To many Rules like after 22:00 you can not use Lift and can be loud. But the communication and the location is perfect.
Place was absolutely amazing definitely will be staying here again soon thank you for allowing us to stay!!

AMAZING nothing was too much trouble for these hosts ! Very welcoming and a joy to deal with as i has many questions . Very quick response in all messages sent . Perfect location for all Prague has to offer x
Hosts were great, apartment was great. No need to say more. Thank you!!
Amazing place! Perfect location.
VERY NICE LOCATION
Spacious place with comfortable beds and nice furnishings. Great for sharing with friends and family.
Was a nice place.
Really nice location and apartment, but the place need a little renovation to be as nice as on the pictures. But overall a really good apartment üôåüèº
Spacious apt, amazing location

I've stayed in numerous apartments in Prague over the last 10 years and this is buy far the biggest, most modern and well equipped in such an amazing location.

The hosts couldn't have been more helpful with moving dates, changing the amount of guests and change of flights due to covid.

Having a group of up to 14 blokes (or girls) is very hard to find accommodation for in Prague, but this place suited us perfectly.
Great place! Perfect for a group of friends for a city break. Great hosts! Location is perfect!
This is a place that has to be seen. Spectacular penthouse such great service. Close to everything you possibly might need or want to to. Will definitely come back again! Thank you üôè
We had a very nice stay. Amazing whirlpool with a view. The appartement was very clean.

Expect great apartment to accomodate many guests for celebration or just enjoy time together. Central location is magical to see Prague castle and old town from the roof. Tho be aware jacuzzi is chlorine based and sensitive people could be irritated by smell and water quality. Thank you for cooperation and pleasant steps to accomodate us.
Fantastic apartement directly in the center of the city

Top location with a great view. We really enjoyed it.
There is absolutely nothing to complain.

Absolutely LOVED the Apartment of Kings! My large group of 13 had an absolute blast, it was the perfect place to hang out and have some drinks on the rooftop. It is exactly as amazing as advertised, I promise you will not be disappointed!

We had a really nice time in prague and the appartement was amazing. We had everything we need and the hosts answered all our questions. The rooftop was a highlight and we enjoyed the view very much. The location of the appartement is perfect to visit prague. We highly recommend the appartment for groups!

Awesome Place to stay in praha. üëåüèªüòâ
Everything worked Fine.üëåüèªüëåüèª

We stayed at the Loft last weekend and it was perfect!
The check-in was great and the communication with the loft people was great.
The location is perfect! In the city center and close to everything. Comfortable rooms, fully equipped kitchen and of course the super cool roof top.
Thanks and we will come back for sure
Beautiful view and the loft is located right in the center of Prague. We highly recommend and we're looking forward to the next stay! Thank you very much.
Great place!
we had a wonderful time in your apartment! looking forward to our next visit
All good
Nice:)

Really good appartment with the best location in the city center you could expect.
Everything was clean and ready for the check in.
If the jacuzzi is an element you really want to use, ask for it to be prepare early in avance. It was quite slow to heat.
Overall great flat, not to be missed!

Definitely the best Airbnb I had so far. Great location, beautiful building, outstanding interior and smooth conversation with the owners. They have amazing views from the terrace, spacious area to chill and all what you need for comfort. Would definitely visit again!
Second stay, fantastic again, I can recommend it to all.

This place has amazing views from the terrace and even straight from the hot tub! The location in general is just outstanding!
What surprised us a bit was seeing the place (that is nice and well equiped) but after we read the description about super cool designer furniture etc. we expected a little bit more. It is a great place to have a party with your friends, because it is not brand new so you dont need to worry about every stain etc. Just be aware that there are only 3 closed bedroms. Other beds are placed in open areas all around the apartment...
It is really great place, whirpool on roof is great, awesome city view. Perfect communication with all team Michal&Michael... The best place in Prague to stay...
Nice apartment, great location and view to historical centre of Prague from terrace. Recommended.
üëç
Great location, helpful host!
Excellent space for a large group. Great location

It was a nice stay in Prag with an amazing whirlpool on the rooftop!
Next stay in Prag I will definitely come back to this amazing appartement:)
Very nice place. Central location. Did enjoy our stay!

Very nice plays in the city center.
The Apartment is beautiful and the owner is very helpful if there is any problem. Any time il come to prague, i wil chose this place to stay.
Amazing place, and will return again
Great party apartment in the heart of Prague
amazing place
Great loft in centre of Prague, very big space, with everything you need. My favorite spot of course was jaccuzzi on the rooftop. Its was a great experience. P.s take with you inside-shoes.

I really enjoy staying in this loft. Everything was great, in the middle of centre . Apartment have a great view at night. Specially enjoying the view from jaccuzi. Loft  was very clean and light, also its was much more bigger than i thought.
Really nice accomodation and even better view! One of the best Airbnb I have ever been to. 10/10 only one bad thing was the water in the whirpool it smelled weirdly. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
The rooftop with the view and the jaccouzi is priceless ! I highly recommend
Good party appartment

The location and accommodation was excellent. Really helpful with local tips and the hot tub was quality!

Would definitely recommend staying here.

This is an amazing apartment! It is ideally located on the edge of Old Town and setups from Charles Bridge. The apartment is large and beautiful and the roof deck has the best view in the city of Prague Castle. The host was attentive to our every need and made excellent suggestions of restaurants, tours, etc. I cannot recommend this place highly enough!
Amazing place to stay right in the heart of Prague! One of the best times I've ever had anywhere in the world you must go visit!!!!

Stayed here 12 friends. had a blast! very comfortable main area with several sleepeing options (not all private).
The location is amazing and the roof top is breathtaking.
the apartment was well warmed. communication was very attending.
Overall amazing apartment for friends on vacation

Fabulous apartment in close walk to the centre and sights.
Really fast communication when needed and everything went smoothly.
Just needed something to wrap up a bit on the terrace but everything was brilliant from start to finish.

Location is the best!!!!! The apartment is exactly what we expected. Clean and stylish. Highly recommend for big group. Very spacious. Host is good at communication. Basically can walk everywhere from the apartment.
Great flat - great location - great hosts. Communication was always easy and on point. Nice furniture and love for details. We‚Äôll be back some day for sure. Thank you !!!

I stayed at this beautiful loft with five friends for a week and the location is perfect, the property is beautiful, and the view from the roof deck/hot tub is unmatched. We were within walking distance to all the areas of Prague 1 and Prague 2 that were on our list to visit. This place is highly recommended and the property owners communicate almost immediately regarding any questions.
This place is amazing and the location couldn't be better. My fiance and I really enjoyed our time here and found it to be inviting and made us feel as if we were still at home.
This people are nice, they hel you with everything and the location and apartment is great. We really enjoyed or time here.

The apartment is very nice. The location is great. A couple beds were just mattresses on the floor and they were not made. We didn‚Äôt need the beds but it cheapened the look and feel of an expensive rental. Overall, our stay was great and I would stay here again.

Great space for a large group. Very clean and spacious. Had a bit of trouble when elevator stopped working on our way out as the apt is on the top floor, but they were communicative throughout the trip. Someone will meet you to let you in and show you around on the day of arrival. Great location.

I can't imagine another apartment in the city having a more incredible view, mixed with an amazing location.  We will definitely look to stay at this place again, when in Prague.  Our family had the perfect first night in this beautiful city.
Everything was excellent and the hosts were very friendly and helpful. Keep it up!
Good location, very nice apartment, great communication
Very nice venue, thank you!

We traveled as a mixed group of children, teens and adults. This place had it all and the location is amazing. Our favorite things about the flat were the rooftop terrace (which would be amazing in the summer), the window nook above the couch was a coveted spot to sit for all of us :), the flat itself is beautiful and well kept. We would highly recommend.
Great place all around. The location is perfect too. You will not be disappointed. Owners are very friendly and give you a lot of tips about the city.

Amazing loft. Great viewing over the city. Everything is in walking distance. Luxury apartment and the whirlpool is that plus extra. The host is always available for help or information, friendly and they prepared also fresh ice cubes for us. We stayed with 12 people and we were fine. Enough space and beds. We can completely recommend this amazing loft.

A great apartment very well situated in the heart of Praha, big volumes, terrace and facilities are very enjoyable. The Michal&Michael team is fantastic, very professional they are always reachable and to not hesitate to help you in your request, their answer are very quick.
The only little negative point would be not to have enough keys (1 or 2 sets) for 11 guest.
We recommend this apartment for spending great time with friends (or big family)
A memorable apartment and one of the best experiences of my trip in Prague!

Michal & Michael's apartment was absolutely spectacular. The building is perfectly located for Old Town Prague, quiet and secure. The amenities were 5 star with spacious and clean bedrooms. The rooftop terrace was the true gem to staying here. After walking several miles each day, everyone in our party couldn't wait to get back and relax in the hot tub or lounge chairs and enjoy the magical views. The staff was amazing - very responsive and professional. If you are considering this property then look no further and book now, you will not be disappointed.

Amazing! The pictures speak for themselves, but Michal & Michael and their staff are even better. You will be missing out if you don‚Äôt stay at this place. Perfect location right near the Charles Bridge, amazing amenities and hospitality.
Very professional and polite host. Returned full deposit without hassle despite that we broke a sofa leg. Apartment and the roof top jacuzzi is fantastic! Five stars for customer experience!
One of the best apartments we ever stayed at. Amazing view, beautiful and spacious inside!
Great experience and lovely views.. we will definitely stay here next time in Prague. Highly recommended.
Everything was perfect
The host canceled this reservation 59 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Amazing flat in great location (prag 1) with all amenities you need. The service was very professional and outstanding. We had such a great time celebrating a stag there. Highly recommendable.
Beautiful apartment, great location & great communication with team

This is the best location for Prague. The views are spectacular. The rooms are great. We had 12 in our party and it worked out for all. The bed/mattress in the main common room is not ideal but it was fine for us for 2 nights. The other rooms all have A/C and comfortable beds. The elevator was a plus. They were kind and helpful. They maintain it so clean. Thank you for making our stay so comfortable!!!!
Great spot for groups! Nice views, central location, and spacious. There is limited privacy in the open areas with sleeping arrangements, but overall a solid spot!
Rooftop terrace makes this place.  Location is incredible.  You won‚Äôt be sorry if you book this flat.
Beautiful apartment is centrally located and has amazing views of the city.  Our hosts were amazing and made us feel welcome. We recommend this apartment highly.
Great location
Great hosts and beautiful apartment in a great location
Very good if you have friends to share the price!

Great communication with all team, very responsive and attentive. The apartment it self is  a stunning place in heart of Prague, very specious, clean and top deck with jacuzzi it‚Äôs an amazing spot, highly recommend.
Beautiful location right near all the spots with amazing amenities.
Fantastic hosts, amazing place
Everything was perfect! :)
Very well located! Great communication ! Thanks

We had a group of fourteen people and we stayed three nights in Prague. Apartment was clean and everything worked really good! Michal and Michael took care of all our requests happily and politely. Only negative side was that the water in the whirlpool was bit dirty. Location was perfect.

I recommend this place to any bigger groups wanting to stay in the center of Prague!

Great location, great place to stay even for a big group!
Thanks!

It was a pleasure for us.
I definitely recommand this apartment.
Everything was great
This apartment is in the perfect location for everything in central Prague. The apartment itself is stunning with everything you need for a perfect stay.
Great location , very good apartment...will come back in the future .

FANTASTIC apartment and PERFECT location.
I cannot recommend this place enough

We were hosted by Eve from Jan 2nd to 5th. The place was very spacious and accomodating as expected. The location was perfect, and the view from the rooftop was priceless with the jacuzzi completing the stay as a top notch. Most of all, I must say Eve made everything to perfection. Eve was very responsive to our questions with most kind attitude. If I were to visit Prague again in the future, I would definitely stay here again.
Great place, amazing location, fantastic views, clean and friendly hosts.  Will be back for sure!

The apartment is a stylish and centrally located gem.  We were within walking distance of many of the sights we wanted to see. The apartment is very unique and beautiful. There was lots of room for our big family group. The upstairs area is open to the living room below so it can be a bit noisy. The view from the deck is lovely and the hot tub was very relaxing after a day of sightseeing.
the apartement is perfect from the Location
Best Apartment in Prague.
beautiful space , right smack in the middle of Prague 1, magnificent view from the rooftop garden of the city and the castle. only downside was having only 2 bathrooms for such a good sized apartment

Amazing apartment and location as mentioned in all previous reviews! Perfectly clean and everything is on their places and working as expected.
I think no one mentioned it but apartment has a great ventilation and you can also control heat in diff areas. So if you are traveling with a baby don't worry much since you can create same climate as in your house.
The accommodations were unparalleled. The location amazing. We had 14 travelers touring Europe, and by far this was the BEST accommodation!

An awesome apartment, right in the centre of the Prague. Was easy to get to and there is everything you need.
The view from the roof is stunning!
Awesome location and super cool roof deck - would recommend to any group looking for a great place to stay in Prague
Thank you for an amazing stay.  Could not have asked for a better location, apartment, and hosts.  Highly recommended!
Great place. Close to everything. Superb terrace on the roof.
Recommend it.
Great location and very easy to communicate with the hosts + the apartment is amazing.
What an AMAZING place this is! Great location! Super clean and very comfortable beds! Rooftop terrace is unbelievable and the view is priceless! Would definitely recommend!

The view was perfect.  The place was nice.  They need to work on the details such as keys, wifi, keeping the patio looking the way it does in pictures.  If they can do this, it is a gem and in the perfect location to see all of Prague.
Great apartment. Host was very responsive and they ensured we had a great stay.

Michal&Michael provided a great place for us to stay.  It was beyond what we were expecting in terms on cleanliness.  We had a small issue in the beginning of the stay however Michal&Michael were quick to resolve it for us.  Overall it was a great experience!
Amazing place.  Lots of beds and beautiful rooftop.   All the amenities you need to have a good time in Prague.   Location is close to old town and  close enough for a long walk to Prague Castle.
This apartment rooftop must be the best in Prague. Incredible views and perfect for a group. Could not recommend more!

We had a great time in Prag. Michael & Michael were great host and especially Eve did a fantastic job. Check-In and Check-Out with her was on point as she was highly welcoming & nice. Top Service! The penthouse is exactly as described on the pictures - the rooftop is insane. Located in the center of Prag this accommodation is a must. Always again. Thanks guys, it was a big pleasure!!

Great apartments and Great Service. EVE was super helpfull and tolerate our creazy schedule and hours with no complains. We were really late for checkout but EVE and cleaning staf patiently wait for us to gather our luggage. If you want to have Really amazing Prague experience i can recommend these host with confidence. Thank You Eve again!

Great place and location but the service was disappointing.

We only got one key for 6 peoples and we were charged 100 EUR for 1 hour late check out. This is too much....

Everything about this place was perfect. The location is right in the centre of Prague so easy walking distance to main tourist spots. The apartment itself was like nothing I've ever stayed in. The views from the roof terrace and hot tub were stunning. The hosts were great at communicating. Great value for money considering everything you get. Would recommend to anyone. Thank you!
Very Nice Flat !!

This place is amazing. It is stylish, spacious, clean, just as advertised. Location is great, close to most of Prague's attractions. The staff was eager to help whenever we had questions. Rooftop jacuzzi was a nice touch as we experienced -6 C or colder for the extent of our trip.

Exactly as the pictures show except the view from the roof is actually better than the photos!? Great location. Great unit for 3 couples and extra room for kids.  An awesome flat in the center of it all.
A beautiful, unique and interesting apartment in the perfect location!

We loved everything about this place!  We had a very special girls weekend with plenty of space and a great place to congregate.  And even though it was winter, we used the hot tub almost every night - what a magnificent view.  All the apartment management was really quick to call if we had questions.  This place is special - the kind of place that makes a trip....Thank you Michel, Michael and Eve~!

Big thanks to Eve who helped me with everthing I asked her. All the recommandation i got from her were really nice.

The appartement was really extraordinary. The appartement couldn't be placed any better. The appartement had e really nice atmosphere, great interi√∏r with mordern architecture in the heart of prague where you are surrounded the historical old town. The view from the top terrace is just beautiful. Clean and nice jacuzzi. Had a n outstanding stay in prague and the appartement.
Perfect location. Great space. Very clean.

Great apartment for a group. Big double bedrooms and great use of space too. Amenities were great too.

Location was very central, walking distance to the centre / main square.

Fabulous apartment. Perfect location. Eve was amazingly helpful and friendly. It really felt like home with all the extra touches and helpful amenities. Stunning layout and super comfy beds. Will definitely come back.

Excellent apartment, ideal for big family or group of friends. High quality and great comfort

Outstanding location

We had the perfect stay in that place. From booking & communication to check-in & check-out everything worked perfectly.
The appartment itself is just awesome. The interior is perfectly arranged, more than enough space even for 12 people. It is perfectly located in Prague old town, you can reach everything you wann experience by a short walk. The view from the terrace is very nice, you have a view on the Moldau river and all over the city. We had a great time there and will definitely come back!!

The apartment is exactly as advertised!  It is just steps from the Charles Bridge, Old Town Square and the other tourist attractions.  All kinds of amenities, from the pictured hot tub, to a nespresso machine, to netflix on the TV.  Communication from the team was great - from the orientation to check ins throughout our stay.  You can't go wrong with choosing this apartment in Prague.
nice apartment! Recommended!

A wonderful apartment in the heart of Prague with a great jacuzzi and an awesome view over the skyline of prague. We had a great weekend and it felt hard to leave the apartment. Definitely a big recommendation!
üëåüëåüëåüëå
Great location and apartment, great hosts, highly recommend staying here
Location is great
Amazing location and host!
Simply exceptional! 100% worth the money

The King's Apartment is an excellent spot to stay with the panoramic views of the city and ample space for families or friends. Amazing location as well, steps from the Charles Bridge, Old Town and Prague Castle.

Only down side was that the hot tub was in need of a serious clean, it's a really cool feature but sadly we didn't use it as much as we would have liked.

Communication was great and check-in was easy. The apartment needed a few things and Leva and Karolina were to quick to respond and help us out.

Highly recommend and would return again.

The Michal&Michael team was wonderful.  They welcomed us to the house with a thorough and friendly orientation. Communication was great. The house was every bit as beautiful both inside and in terms of location as advertised on the website. They stayed in touch seamlessly throughout our stay for any questions we had. We can't recommend both the location and the people highly enough.

Five stars!!! We had a really high expectations seeing the photos but seeing the apartment in reality is 10times better. We had everything we needed and I must say experiencing the center and such a prime location we felt it was a good value for our money. Having a bathtub for ourself on the rooftop was definitely a highlight - we felt like celebrities:) could not recommend more !
Unbelievable flat I couldn't recommend it more. Location, service, cleanliness, everything is 10/10! The best flat in Prague hands down

This place is awesome! We were there for one night and regret not staying any longer. The flat war very spacy, clean, comfortable, had everything in it and has left no wishes open. The rooftop incl. the jacuzzi is insane. The stuff was always helpful and answered all questions. We would come back any time!!! This place will make your Prague trip unique, believe me!
This has to be the nicest Airbnb in Prague. Can't ask for a better place. Michael's team was super helpful. It seriously doesn't get much better than the rooftop terrace.

This place is absolutely beautiful. You won‚Äôt find anywhere better.

Special thanks to Jaroslav for making sure we had everything we needed.
Very clean, center to walk everywhere, beds are comfortable, jakuzi was amazing, good view at roof top

‚ÄãWhen I saw this apartment on Airbnb, I thought it was too good to be true. When we arrived, I was happy to see that it was all that and more. The apartment is spacious, well appointed with really cool decor. The rooftop was amazing with fabulous views. It was definitely the icing on the cake!! The apartment is in the perfect location, walking distance to everything. We felt we had found a gem and we were thrilled to be there. Carolina was great to communicate with and was very quick to respond to all our inquiries. When we arrived Michael, Karolina, Jaroslav, and Veronika were all there to greet us and show us around. Michael even showed up with a bottle of champs for my son‚Äôs 23rd Birthday. Can‚Äôt say enough about this amazing apartment and the kind and helpful Hosts! I am definitely coming back!

This apartment is even better than the pictures suggest. It is very spacious and fully equipped. The views are stunning all day - from sunrise to sunset! We stayed here with 8 people (two families) and had plenty of room. In addition, it was in the perfect location for touring Praha - everything was just a 5-15 minute walk away. Our host was very easy to work with and communicated with us the whole time.
Best place to live in Prague!

Beautiful space! We spent most of our time out in the city, but it'd be crazy not to take some beautiful photos on the rooftop. The castle view is real. And the hot tub was fun too. Just make sure to ask your hosts to turn on the air conditioning before you arrive in the summer, or you'll be met with some uncomfortable heat!

This is one of THE places to be in Praha!  For a couple of families, the multiple beds and open spaces are great...for business meetings the main floor works well as a creative meeting space and break time on the roof! Michael and Jaroslav were amazingly responsive...no question that it will be on my list for a return trip!
It was an incredible time in a awesome apartment. Would recommend it everytime. Thank you very much for being your guest!

I would definitely recommend choosing this place!!! Never in my life have I imagined such a place with such a view!
The apartment was absolutely gorgeous. The location was just perfect and the view was absolutely amazing with the Prague Castle on one side and the Old Town on the other. The thing we appreciated the most was the jacuzzi on the rooftop. Drinking champagne while laying in hot water and watching the sunset behind the cathedral was one of the most marvelous things we‚Äôve ever experienced. The grill also came in handy. The host recommended a great butcher‚Äôs shop nearby and we had a wonderful BBQ.¬†¬†Our two families had a truly amazing time in Prague, we already miss it. We are definitely coming back soon. We already found our place!!!

This Airbnb is AMAZING. We were a group of 8, and we had plenty of room to sleep and hang out. The real gem is the private roof, with a jacuzzi, comfortable outdoor furniture, and an unbeatable view of some of Prague's most iconic landmarks (castle, clock tower, etc.). The location is also great, steps away from Old Town, Charles Bridge, and lots of great restaurants, bars and clubs. The apartment is on a high floor (elevator in building) so noise was never an issue.

The hosts were gracious enough to write up a full Prague guide that our group took full advantage of, including recommendations for restaurants, bars, coffee shops and sites to see. They were very responsive to any questions / concerns I had before we booked, and were great to deal with.

Overall, I would recommend this Airbnb to anyone. It truly made our experience in Prague special, and made it really convenient to tour the city. Many in my group noted that this was the best Airbnb they've every stayed in (especially because of the rooftop!). We'll be back!

These hosts was great even accommodating us letting us check in at 2 AM in the morning. The place was stunning and exactly like described. We were only there a short period of time so tried fitting in as much as possible. We had a little issue with the electrical because the power kept shorting out but after a quick phone call we were told maintenance would fix. I think this may have had something to do with the jacuzzi because as we tried to heat it the power would always cut out. We could not use it because of this. Was definitely a disappointment. One of my guests had fallen over onto a table in the loft and broke it. I had called the owner straight away to arrange a cash payment for the damages. 2 days later I received a message saying the owner had found a broken light and wanted to seek damages. We did not break the light so I told them we would not pay. I haven't had any further contact from the owner.

The apartment is really amazing !
The best one that I've ever seen.
All is perfect :
- the location to visit Praha
- the wonderful design, very beautiful
- the amazing view on the castle (from the jacuzzi... cherry on the cake:-))
- the rooms' sizes
- the equipment (Big sound, Big TV, kitchen well equipped, barbecue, Jacuzzi, outdoor heating, king size beds very very comfortable, private elevator, wifi, etc...)
- a lot of presents from Veronika (wine, water, Nespresso coffee...)

I can't imagine a better place in Praha... I think that's really impossible !!!
The roof top is inimitable.

We did a bachelor party with my friends there, and the event will stay in our memories for all the life. That's why I want to thank Veronika very much, because without her and her incredible apartment, the stay would not have been so crazy.

NB : sorry for my bad English (I'm french) but I don't have enough superlatives to describe the apartment and Veronika !
i recommend this scenic rooftop app to everyone how want to visit Prague, i have never been in better place! Also party are allowed here :)

Great accommodation with great location and sensational terrace.
Stayed for 1 night in the Kings apartment and enjoyed the stay very much. Communication with the host was very good and check-in was easy.
The apartment was very clean and in a top location not far away from the Charles Bridge.
The highlight is of course the roof terrace with a jacuzzi and perfect views of Prague.
Unfortunately, the accommodation is a bit outdated in some places, but I was able to overlook because the accommodation was comparatively favorable on other days.
Everything was right
All very well. Very friendly and attentive at all times. Good location.

Very good stay experience, very central location, very close to the castle, the apartment is very beautiful, the only thing I think is insufficient, the main room on the left will hear the running water noise at night, I hope to improve

Celebrating my birthday here with friends and the location was really strong! Unfortunately, the pool on the second night was no longer so hot, which was a shame, but everything else was great. Definitely have to come again in the summer!
Listing as described with very good responsiveness to my requests

Great apartment, however, I have to take 2 stars off for the hot tub, since it unfortunately did not work properly and was very dirty, the water was cloudy and had an unpleasant smell, unfortunately there was also a cigar to be found by the landlord on the drain from the pool, in addition to that the toilet flush does not always work, otherwise there is probably mold on the upper floor.
The perfect apartment for a large group. The location is super central and the terrace is an absolute highlight. Thank you for staying at the beautiful apartment.

Beautiful apartment, beautiful location.
Anytime again <3

Very nice apartment. Hosts are very approachable, quick response and helpful. We were able to check in early and that was very nice and flexible due to our early flight
The space was clean and we could really appreciate the Christmas tree and holiday decorations.
It is quiet in the house, the beds are good and the PS 5 has been fully used by the youth.
The roof terrace is a great extra with the jacuzzi which is wonderfully warm and clean.
Fortunately, the building has an elevator, because otherwise it would be a lot of stairs up and down, as the house is on the 4th floor.

So all in all a very good experience and we felt very much at home.

2 tips I would like to give hosts for an extra good guest experience;
1. Provide a decent espresso machine, that coffee pot is not worthy of the apartment.
2. Provide a welcome package, with e.g. some fruit, a bottle of wine or some beer in the fridge for everyone. Of course, this is much more pleasant to enter and then it feels even more complete.

Everything was great. Very friendly hosts, very helpful and accommodating.
The place was extremely nice and a great location.
Only the hot tub unfortunately had dirty water in it and the kettle had old water in it and was not very pleasant to smell.
Andon most perfect.
Thank you and happy to come back.
The place is amazing, the location is unbeatable, everything is within walking distance and it is amazing.
The hosts were very thoughtful and friendly, very responsive, and the apartment was quite clean and welcoming.

Very nice apartment and enough space for a large group.
The hot tub and the view from the terrace were the highlight of the apartment for us.

Beautiful base.
Location is key here!
Has something special. Also ideal with kids.
Some usage damage here and there, but still recommended.
Great location and nice apartment!

Great location of the location! The communication also worked great. Beds are good and comfortable and not cluttered. However, it is a pity that there is visible water imposing two ceilings in sleeping rooms, where water also drips through in case of rainy events. Also two broken sun loungers  (of 2)on the roof top as well as no functional parasol. The security camera for the roof top area must definitely be suspended. All in all - somewhat affected accommodation - but absolutely overdone for over 3000‚Ç¨ for two nights.
Beautiful, spacious apartment with unforgettable views. Nice communication with the operators.

The private roof terrace and central location are very special. The whole apartment makes a high-quality impression and offers plenty of space. The beds were very comfortable and the equipment reads nothing to be desired. Communication with the host went smoothly. We definitely recommend the apartment for larger groups to get to know Prague.
For fresher groups, the apartment is perfect! The location is mega, whether it's for partying or sightseeing.
Everything perfect. thanks so much
Everything worked out great and we had a very nice relaxing stay in the best location with our round (13 people)!
Great apartment, perfect location.
Nice penthouse. Cozy with own jacuzzi.
We were completely provided with very good information. If we had a question, we were helped immediately. Very nice team!

Great location, panoramic views overlooking the entire city center of Prague.
Very nice apartment with amazing rooftop however we were surprised to find that the double beds only have one duvet for one place and we had to use the duvets from the empty beds.
The water in the hot tub has a very strong smell and is cloudy, it looks like it hasn't been changed in a while.
A list of ubuesque rules with overpriced fines.
Only one set of keys for 6 is right.
For the rental price, a real coffee machine would be welcome.
For all these reasons, there is no good value for money.

Ps: There is a window leak in bedroom #3
We all recommend this place in the city center of Prague.
Great accommodation!
Wonderful

The place is right in the old town in Prague. The roof terrace is fantastic. We had a nice few days to 6 in Prague. However, some pieces of furniture are in great need of renovation or urgently need to be renewed. Cleanliness is definitely expandable. In addition, we had no water at least 1 hour every day. In the kitchen there is no coffee maker and no basic equipment such as salt, pepper and oil. The hot tub is extremely chlorine content, so we caught a rash on our body almost all after 3 days. A traveler even had to go to the doctor and a Kortison salmon. Unfortunately, the value for money is not right here and unfortunately we cannot share the good reviews.
You are all set :) Thank you!
Very satisfied!

Perfect place for groups. We were in Prague to celebrate our completion of further education. Accommodation ideal for 10 persons in a perfect location. Everything you need is available inside the apartment. Very easy and good waking up with landlord. I'd love to come back.

Everything was fine , beautiful luxury apartment and beautiful view of Prague cell:) I can only recommend , big terrace and very good whirlpool :) we were satisfied 100% )) we can only recommend:) Thank you

Very nice and large apartment. The roof terrace is an absolute highlight. The location is perfect. You can walk to everything without any problems. Very friendly hosts who can be reached immediately if you have any questions.
Really nice place, very centrally located and the roof terrace is great for a celebration... but the roof terrace now needs some improvement

Very nice contact with very good concept. Nearby parking garage, metro, breakfast options, local and everything within walking distance. Easy check-in and check-out. Would fully recommend for ages up to 55 or 60. The apartment is a little outdated but very well maintained and clean.
Nice location, nice apartment, but there are small signs of apartment wear and tear...
Beautiful apartment. Spacious, perfectly located. The terrace is phenomenal. The Prague castle is a beautiful experience from a hot tub

The location is wonderful. The apartment is clean, with a stunning view from the terrace of the Prague Castle and the Tyn Temple. The jacuzzi on the terrace is a special treat. Responded very quickly to all questions that arose. I recommend to everyone üëç
Beautiful place to relax on the terrace .
Satisfied. Perfect location in the middle of Prague.
Great place. We had a great trip.
Great, always happy to come back!!
Beautiful apartment in the heart of Prague, hard to be better placed!
everything in between.

Superb apartment, very clean, very well equipped. We really enjoyed the hot tub! Great location, right in the center.
Great hospitality.

I had requested for a photo shoot for social media right after booking, as I wanted to pay 150 euros cancellation costs rather than not getting the seemingly great apartment. Then the owners immediately asked if it was advertised, only social media was okay. I didn't mean directly, but since social media is always advertising in theory, they should tell me what the conditions would be if we were talking about advertising. Suddenly, there was no response. I asked again the day after and yet nothing came. We had then thought because of the 'ok' to social media and no further answer that it would probably be okay. Then ONE day before arrival (after we had planned a trip for 11 people from Aachen to Prague and had rented two more locations for the same purpose without any problems in Prague) Jana wrote to me that they would now want to class it as an advertisement and that it would then cost the FOUR TIMES the price. After I told her that this was not possible, as she would have had to communicate this much earlier and it would have incredible follow-up costs for us to cancel now, she probably talked to the owner of the location and said it would only cost '200 euros more. I find this kind of impossible and tricky.

About the apartment itself: Location is great and on the roof terrace you can tolerate it well. Still, I think the location is rather dirty for the price. We were in Praha 4 the night before in an apartment which was only 300 euros more expensive and this was one of the most crass and beautiful apartments we have ever seen. This made this location seem all the more run-down and, above all, much darker than shown in the photos. So if you don't care about money and who just wants to live centrally, you can take the apartment. But if you are looking for an exceptional location for your stay that is absolutely worth its price, I advise against this location.
üëç

Very clean and beautiful place to stay with an incredible view over Prague. The location is perfect and you can enjoy both Prague and the party life there perfectly.
the hot tub is great for relaxing on the roof terrace.

Thanks for the lovely stay in your apartment. It is very modern and decorated in a very modern way. There is everything you need for a relaxing holiday. The highlight is the wonderful roof terrace overlooking the Veitsdom. We had nice weather and used you extensively. The location is ideal for sightseeing tours and although it is so central it is very quiet. Also, checking in and out was very easy and Eve always responded immediately to questions. Thank you so much for this wonderful holiday.
Everything was great :) blankets were not prepared and not enough towels for 3 days/2 nights. Otherwise, everything was great
Modernly furnished,super located,large,really good beds, 2 bathrooms,kitchen, 2 soft sofas to relax,hot tub,gas grill,sun loungers.
Very happy with the complete apartment. Very clean and well equipped. Friendly handling.

Great with good location,building with sense of history. There is a personal elevator but only can use to going down. massage bathtub quite nice on the top. The view of the top floor is amazing, everything is perfect .thx for that.

Great location, lots of restaurants and shops nearby, great view on the top floor, the price matches the actual situation, the apartment building is very historic, thank you for this stay!

The location is so good that when the driver picks us up, you can park directly at the door.Behind Charlie Bridge is the Old Town is convenient to walk everywhere.Suitable for friends to spend some time cooking and sunbathing on the rooftop of the building.

Hello, I rented the apartment for a friend with friends as a surprise. Everyone was willing to help with everything, even though we were dealing with a few complications there (from me), so I would give 10 stars for communication. The place is beautiful, everyone complimented it, and we've discussed the idea of going back. The view is indescribable as well as the overall design of the apartment. Beautiful place and all the accessories to have fun, snorkel, and sleep. It was a beautiful evening for all of us. üôÇ

It was absolutely as expected. The photos are interesting, but wait until you see the apartment for yourself. Great communication and organization from the host.
I would recommend.
Jan Novotny
It is without exaggerating the best apartment in Prague of every little thing would be thought of and everything prepared in advance

Great apartment, central location, big and spacious.
Unfortunately, very responsive, but of course you can expect that in such an old property.
Great stay, as expected. Glad to come back!

Great location, unimaginably convenient location.First-class enjoyment in a first-class location, right next to the Charles Bridge, the bedroom is very comfortable, fully equipped with kitchen utensils, Xiadu is very welcoming, and the service is thoughtful and fast!Soak in the hot tub on the rooftop, and the panoramic view of the church is just across the road.
Everything is great! I'd love to come back!
Top days in a great apartment!!

Everything is fine, I'd love to come back.
Nice contact and very helpful.
Was really a fantastic place to stay,highly recommended!!

Thank you for your warm hospitality, specially provided local tips on where to eat and stay, and were always available to answer our questions. This house is located next to the Rudolph Concert Hall, right next to the Rudolph Concert Hall, all within walking distance of Charles Bridge and Old Town Square. The room is in an old building, on the top floor, there is an elevator, the decoration of the room is very modern, there is a very nice terrace, you can barbecue, take a bath, and you can watch the sunset.
Unfortunately, the bathroom is a little less, we stayed with 9 people this time, sometimes we need to queue up...
Very good place, clean with very good location and very nice, we had a great time.

The penthouse was very large and well maintained, it is very modern and luxuriously equipped. We had extremely much fun and we were even able to check out at 12pm. The hosts were very friendly and helped us in all matters.

It was one of the best apartments we stayed in in the center of Europe. We found her at the last minute and were pleasantly surprised to see the apartment ,a beautiful view from the balcony. We stayed there for two nights. We arrived by taxi and found a place with ease. We were greeted by the pleasant helpful Veronica and recommended us things to see nearby. There are lovely restaurants literally a few meters away. We have picked this apartment to celebrate our anniversary in the family circle. It was very convenient to get to all tourist places, the weather was wonderful and we spent a lot of time on the balcony with an amazing view of the city. Jakuziis a great addition to the apartment. It has a great view of the castle. We had a lot of fun. Both young and adult.

The apartment resembles a gallery design with a very thoughtful and accurate layout with interesting big paintings on the walls ,which my mother loved a fan of Modern Art. The apartment is highly recommended for families. There is a large kitchen salon with all the amenities comfortable bedrooms. Everything is decorated in great taste. We ordered an apartment to celebrate my mother's birthday. It was an amazing vacation, everyone was very happy. A real find!

The apartment is very large, very nice and spacious with roof terrace overlooking the castle, even with a hot tub!
I highly recommend the apartment!
